page.title: 16Burford Playground Games
page.content: One of the games we play is called Budge,a very long game.The most people who can play are five.You all stand on something and if someone hasn't got anything they go up to another player and sayÂ£Budge'and then try and catch them.We also play Duck,duck,goose,where you sit in a circle.someone walks round saying Â£Duck,duck.'When they say'goose' you try and catch them.If you do they go in the cooking pot in the middle.In the paddock we play Â£Go spells go'.When this is said,everybody does a handstand and the longest up says it again.We also play Â£It's cold under the apple tree' which is a skipping game.The boys mostly play football,and marbles,and conkers in season.
